title: Ifigenia
typeOfFood: Lacto, Ovo, Organic, Buffet, Mediterranean, Beer/Wine, Take-out, Cretan, Greek
description: Daily specials, range of starters, falafel main dish, Cretan specialties like wild greens, purslane salad, hyazinthe bulbs, vegan gigantes, fennel-pies. Special buffet on Friday with many vegan and gluten-free dishes (reservation suggested). Quiet and relaxing atmosphere with free Wi-Fi. Directions: Located on the road from the beach to Rethymno, around 1 km from the beach a right turn before the petrol station. There is a sign post directing to the restaurant at the turn.
streetAddress: Plakias, on the road to Kalypso, turn left after Oasis
